title: BIM for Impact: Designing Tomorrow
description: A unique event designed by Prof. Vittorio Andrea Sellaro, with the strategic collaboration of Prof. Massimiliano Campi and Prof. Valeria Cera, bringing together academia, professionals, and industry leaders.
